title: Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB to build dynamic full-stack web applications.

title: UI/UX Design Essentials
description: Learn modern UI/UX principles, design systems, and tools like Figma and Adobe XD to create stunning user experiences.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Explore Python, NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib to perform data analysis, visualization, and predictive modeling.

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Build effective marketing campaigns using SEO, social media, and analytics to grow your business online.

title: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Create cross-platform mobile apps using React Native and integrate APIs for real-time functionality.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Understand supervised and unsupervised learning, regression models, and neural networks using scikit-learn and TensorFlow.

title: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
description: Learn ethical hacking, penetration testing, and network security techniques to protect systems from cyber threats.

title: Photography Masterclass
description: Master professional photography, lighting, and post-processing using Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Learn blockchain architecture, smart contracts, and decentralized app (dApp) development using Solidity and Ethereum.

title: Video Editing for Beginners
description: Edit stunning videos using Adobe Premiere Pro and DaVinci Resolve. Learn transitions, effects, and storytelling techniques.
